import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Table } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" class Cart extends Component { render() { return (

{this.props.info.title}


{ this.props.cart.map(item => ( )) }
Product Name Price
this.props.delete(item)} className="fas fa-times-circle text-danger" style={{ "marginRight": "3px" }}> {item.productName} ({item.quantity}) {item.unitPrice * item.quantity}$
({item.quantity} x {item.unitPrice}$)

TOTAL PRICE : {this.props.totalPrice}$

); } } export default Cart;
